What's the maximum sustainable Amazon Prime fee?

Today, $COST is 1/2 blended fee of AMZN, has higher GMV/member, but 10% lower retention rate. Price will likely rise $5 or 8% in next 3 years. 

You can look at this as an example of a "ceiling" or as evidence of AMZN value prop.
